author: Ian Allison
title: Crypto Investment Firms 3iQ, Cryptonite Debut Structured Investment Vehicle in Switzerland
description: The 3iQ Criptonite Multi-Factor actively managed certificate is a hedge fund that uses a long/short strategy.
content: Crypto asset manager 3iQ has debuted one of its hedge fund products as an actively managed certificate (AMC) with the Swiss regulated partner Criptonite Asset Management, the companies said on Thursd… [+779 chars]
